ModMetaData.name: Fairer Rituals
ModMetaData.author: Seanbeag
ModMetaData.description:
This mod aims to make ritual outcomes a little fairer for people who have put the effort into providing all the requested ingredients.
Conversion: Improves chances of good outcome at full requirements. Increases cap for room impressiveness and social skill. Reduces offset of higher expectations.
Sky Lanterns: Improves chance of good outcome at full requirements.
Disco Party: Allows Leader to act as DJ. Improves chances of good outcome at full requirements.
Execution: Improves chances of good outcome at full requirements.
